column1: Little Goat Diner////I can't say enough good things about this place
column2: I think I'm obsessed.  My boyfriend has a severe gluten intolerance
column3: so any restaurant with an entire gluten-free menu is pretty exciting.  It's also the best new restaurant I've visited in a long time
column4: I think every time I take my first bite of anything
column5: my eyes roll into the back of my head.  I've had the bull's eye french toast
column7: and Gluten-free boy has eaten the Los Drowned
column13: and smoke fries. The GF menu is really quite extensive
